body_html: Thanks for clarification @colesbury, do you think if the output of the topk is based on ascending, descending, and without sorted (based on smallest index first) is a good idea. I think unspecified output might not useful for the user because of the uncertainty of the output.
body_text: Thanks for clarification @colesbury, do you think if the output of the topk is based on ascending, descending, and without sorted (based on smallest index first) is a good idea. I think unspecified output might not useful for the user because of the uncertainty of the output.
body: Thanks for clarification @colesbury, do you think if the output of the `topk` is based on ascending, descending, and without sorted (based on smallest index first) is a good idea. I think **unspecified** output might not useful for the user because of the uncertainty of the output.
